Name: maximize_project_budget
Description: Maximize the total budget allocated across all projects

Name: minimize_project_duration
Description: Minimize the total duration of projects (end - start)

Name: maximize_team_size
Description: Maximize the number of members in teams to increase capacity

Name: minimize_worker_unavailability
Description: Minimize the number of workers with inactive status

Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Maximize the sum of priority scores of features

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Minimize the total effort required for all tasks

Name: maximize_story_points
Description: Maximize the total story points completed per sprint

Name: minimize_sprint_duration
Description: Minimize the length of sprints (end - start)

Name: maximize_velocity_trend
Description: Maximize the positive trend in team velocity

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the total severity of active blockers

Name: maximize_stakeholder_influence
Description: Maximize the influence level of engaged stakeholders

Name: minimize_epic_estimated_effort
Description: Minimize the total estimated effort for epics

Name: maximize_sprint_achievement
Description: Maximize the average goal achievement across sprints

Name: minimize_documentation_age
Description: Minimize the age of feature documentation (inverse of creation_date)

Name: maximize_release_plan_inclusion
Description: Maximize the number of features included in release plans
